scripts.mochawesome-merge: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress-regression-pack: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run test -- --browser electron & npm run test -- --browser firefox & npm run test -- --browser edge & npm run test -- --browser chrome && npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.cypress-multi-browser: npm run test -- --browser electron & npm run test -- --browser firefox & npm run test -- --browser edge & npm run test -- --browser chrome
